blogPost.excerpt: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
blogPost.body: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
blogPost.title: Time Capsule - Transform your 2020 into a tiny, personalized book for free!
blogPost.author: Zaake De Coninck

localize.description: 回答几个问题，我们将把你的记忆变成一本小小的、个性化的书，里面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事实，包括来自你的家乡 ✔️奇思妙想的插图 100%免费，你将在10分钟内收到你的小册子!
localize.tagline: 将你的2020年免费改造成一本小小的个性书!

localize.description: 回答幾個問題，我們將把你的記憶變成一本小小的、個性化的書，裏面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事實，包括來自你的家鄉 ✔️奇思妙想的插圖 100%免費，你將在10分鐘內收到你的小冊子!

next.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
next.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely

localize.description: HomeWerk帮助团队进行社交活动，并建立更牢固的关系，而不受地点、时区和公司内部职位的限制。我们提供持续积极的自动化团队建设课程，让团队除了工作之外，还能谈论其他一切。
localize.tagline: 帮助团队在远程工作中保持快乐

localize.description: HomeWerk幫助團隊進行社交活動，並建立更牢固的關係，而不受地點、時區和公司內部職位的限制。我們提供持續積極的自動化團隊建設課程，讓團隊除了工作之外，還能談論其他一切。
localize.tagline: 幫助團隊在遠程工作中保持快樂
